fields.name: Subalignments:
fields.value: Fire, Air, Water, Earth, Dark, Light

fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- If the largest good faction is the Town, 2324: Unit will always spawn. If it's Florae, 2325: Roggle will spawn. If it's City, 2326: Drak will spawn. If it's Sentries, 2327: Songun will spawn. If it's Army, 2328: Tweed will spawn. If it's NETSEC, 2329: PixelRoggle will spawn. If it's NTF, 2330: Monitor will spawn.
- Only one member of each subalignment may spawn.
- Factional chat
- No factional kill unless no kill-capable Beasts are alive.
- Only one member may use a killing ability each night.
- Members cannot win with Pokemon for any reason.
- Once a member's Unlock Condition is met, all Locked parts of their abilities and attributes apply for the rest of the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you or something probably idfk

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Kill all who would oppose you or something probably idfk
